transcript:
John Dillinger:
My friends call me John but a son of a bitch screw like you better refer to me as Mr. John Dillinger. | My friends call me John But a son of a bitch screw like you better address me as Mr dillinger
subtitles: {"1":{"TimeStart":1,"TimeEnd":2.456,"Text":"My friends call me John"},"2":{"TimeStart":4.128,"TimeEnd":7.62,"Text":"But a son of a bitch screw like you better address me as Mr dillinger"}}
movie_writer: Ronan Bennett, Michael Mann, Ann Biderman
movie_plot: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.
